competitors.name: Salesforce Nonprofit Cloud
competitors.notes: CRM for nonprofits on Salesforce platform

context: In 2020, Blackbaud was the leading provider of software for nonprofits, foundations, and education. The pandemic accelerated digital fundraising needs. A major security incident in 2020 impacted customer trust. Salesforce's nonprofit expansion created new competition. Blackbaud served over 45,000 organizations globally.
